title: Council Decision of 22 April 1996 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 22 April 1996 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (96/C 136/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 80/156/EEC of 21 January 1980 setting up an Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, by its Decision of 23 October 1995 (2), the Council appointed Dr Michèle BRUAIRE a member of the Committee for the period ending 22 October 1998;
Whereas the French Government has nominated Dr Pierre BOTREAU-ROUSSEL to replace Dr Michèle BRUAIRE,
main_body: Dr Pierre BOTREAU-ROUSSEL is hereby appointed a member for the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives in place of Dr Michèle BRUAIRE for the remainder of her term of office, which ends on 22 October 1998.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 22 April 1996.
For the Council
The President
W. LUCHETTI
(1) OJ No L 33, 11. 2. 1980, p. 13.
(2) OJ No C 292, 7. 11. 1995, p. 2.
